name: ax-c10
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(s0, w0))), w0)
comment: A variant of ~ ax6 . Axiom scheme C10' in [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of the preprint). This axiom is obsolete and should no longer be used. It is proved above as theorem ~ axc10 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.) (New usage is discouraged.)
